subject: Fishing, Sport
Fish and Other Marine Life
lead_paragraph: I take good fortune at the beginning of a fishing trip as a signal of impending disaster. Thus, when I hooked into a bruising brown trout within 10 minutes of wading, I was worried.
snippet: I take good fortune at the beginning of a fishing trip as a signal of impending disaster. Thus, when I hooked into a bruising brown trout within 10 minutes of wading, I was worried.
